name: Asleep Walking - demo - lvl1 - VR Vive
name_original: Asleep Walking - demo - lvl1 - VR Vive
description:
Made with the Original Vive.  Hold the big D Circle Pad and swing your arms to move.

Thanks for checking this out.  

This is my first VR project demo, I have 4 other levels in varying stages of completeness, with about 2 nearly done.  This first level has some things purposefully removed from it that I want to be a surprise for the final release.   I am hoping to get some feedback / support to complete the bigger vision for a full-length adventure game.  Maybe someone would like to join the team?

Essentially the story is about a disgruntled teenage boy, who dreams up all sorts of wild things...  It is adult and angel-demon themed with youthful kid stuff sprinkled throughout.   It is meant to be more of an atmospheric story and exploratory experience.  Rewarding those who explore, but essentially with a metaphorical ticking clock in the background to keep the story moving.  Without giving much away, there is kind of a "escape the room" element to progress as well, so you need to pay attention.

The music was made by me for the game, a lot of the content is modified from the Unreal marketplace.  A lot of the art/posters are original, but some is also creative commons.  A full list of the sources will be released with the full game release.

Want to help support the project?  Want to test it on your headset and controllers?  Dream up a level?  Want to help tighten things up with your Unreal skills to polish the experience?  Maybe a donation to keep things moving?

Want to help with a kickstarter?   I don't know, I just know I would love to collab on this and see what a small team could manifest.   Please contact me if interested. :)
